project.name: CloudKid Audio API
project.description: CloudKid Audio API: a library for playing HTML5 sprite audio

cloudkid.Audio.name: cloudkid.Audio
cloudkid.Audio.description: Audio class is designed to play audio sprites in a cross-platform compatible manner using HTML5 and the SwishSprite library.

AudioInst.name: AudioInst
AudioInst.description:
A playing instance of a sound. This class is primarily for compatability/standardization with CloudKidSound,
and to make syncing animation with audio easier. These can only be created through cloudkid.Audio.instance.play().

cloudkid.VOPlayer.name: cloudkid.VOPlayer
cloudkid.VOPlayer.description:
A class for managing audio by only playing one at a time, playing a list, and even
managing captions (CloudKidCaptions library) at the same time.

params.name: useCaptions
params.description:
If a cloudkid.Captions object should be created for use 
		or the captions object to use

If this AudioInst is still valid (still the actively playing audio bit).
If this is false, then Audio is no longer playing this sound and this object should be discarded.

The cloudkid.Captions object used for captions. The developer is responsible for initializing this with a captions
dictionary config file and a reference to a text field.

params.description: The alias of the audio file to play.

params.name: callback
params.description: The function to call when playback is complete.

classitems.description:
Plays a list of audio files, timers, and/or functions, interrupting any current playback.
Audio in the list will be preloaded to minimize pauses for loading.
classitems.name: playList

params.name: list
params.description: The array of items to play/call in order.

params.name: callback
params.description: The function to call when playback is complete.

classitems.description: Callback for when audio/timer is finished to advance to the next item in the list.
classitems.name: _onAudioFinished

classitems.description:
The update callback used for silence timers and updating captions without active audio.
This method is bound to the VOPlayer instance.
classitems.name: _update

params.name: elapsed
params.description: The time elapsed since the previous frame, in milliseconds.

classitems.description:
The update callback used for updating captions with active audio.
This method is bound to the VOPlayer instance.
classitems.name: _updateCaptionPos

params.name: elapsed
params.description: The time elapsed since the previous frame, in milliseconds.

classitems.description: Plays the current audio item and begins preloading the next item.
classitems.name: _playAudio

classitems.description: Stops playback of any audio/timer.
classitems.name: stop

classitems.description: Cleans up this VOPlayer.
